name: Azumarill
flavorText:
It lives in water virtually all day long.
Its body color and pattern act as
camouflage that makes it tough for
enemies to spot in water.

previous.name: Marill
previous.flavorText:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

next.name: Sudowoodo
next.flavorText:
Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.

pokemon.name: Azurill
pokemon.flavorText:
A Pokémon that lives by water.
It moves quickly on land by
bouncing on its big tail.

pokemon.name: Marill
pokemon.flavorText:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.
